::Grimlock::
=A0
Grimlock takes cover under one of the shuttles wings. He c=
ontinues to fire off his flame breathe at any incoming Minion forces.
=A0
:=
:Lord Elder::
=A0
Elder opens the shuttle hatch and begins fireing off his =
blaster to add to the shuttles shots.
=A0
::Lord Jhiaxus/Scorponok-Zarak::
=
=A0
Jhiaxus comes low to the ground and ejects Zarak.
=A0
Zarak lands in th=
e Scorponok cockpit and activates the shell.
=A0
Scorponok launches two roc=
kets, fires the fusion tail and the machine gun batteries at the Minions. T=
he attack is coming from just outside the battle perimeter and from behind =
most of the Minions.
=A0
Jhiaxus heads streight into the masses and dogfigh=
ts the Sweeps.
=A0
::Dark Rodimus::
=A0
Rodimus pulls up to the peremter of=
 the fight and watches. The battle is intense. Many will die. The fate of e=
verything in their existence could be changed by the outcome. He was happy.=

=A0
With the sound of screeching tires Rodimus heads right into battle. He=
 vehical form leaps into the air and transforms. He lands on one knee near =
the Maximal shuttle. Rodimus slowly raises to a standing position.
=A0
He l=
ooks up at Cyclonus and releases an all out assualt. Over shouler rockets, =
his rapid fire wrist mounts, optic lasers and his duel weld machine pistols=
.
=A0
::Kup::
=A0
Very far from the battle Kup was with Elita at the Watche=
r base. He watched the readout screen in horror. In the last hour he had wa=
tched all the forces of each battle converge at one point: the Ark! This wa=
s the big push and they had to push back. He knew what must be done.
=A0
Ku=
p: Elita, you must do me a favor. Without protest I need you to stay here w=
ith the staff. I have to go to that battle. I cannot sit out on a situation=
 this serious any longer. Please understand.

--- On Wed, 7/9/08, supercycl=
onus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

From: supercyclonus <supercyclonus@y=
ahoo.com>
Subject: Re: The War of the ARK!
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Date:=
 Wednesday, July 9, 2008, 5:11 PM






> OOC: Can I assume that the Maxima=
l/Iron Skull Predacons are 
> on their way?

((OOC: Sounds good to me. If y=
ou want to control them, I do not mind 
their appearance.) )

Lord Elder's =
commands were carried out by the station and the guns 
erupted into the air=
 with a deadly symphony of wreckage! Firepower 
ripped into the invaders as=
 first the shuttle's batteries and then 
the Ark violently pulled sweeps fr=
om the skies! 

However much like the last battle the sweeps dispersed, mak=
ing them 
much harder to hit. Using their agility and speed they turned in =
the 
air, spinning as the weapons continued to pepper the skies with 
bulle=
ts and energy!

Legacy for his part pulled back, using the Ark as an additi=
onal 
defence as he laid into the oncoming sweeps. Much like Lord Elder's 
=
attack, it was effective but the sweep disperesed, leaving him to 
pick one=
 or two out of the air at a time rather then destroying many 
at a time. 

=
As Jhiaxus and Scorponok, Grimlock and Hydras and Rodimus all 
approached f=
rom their different vectors, they could all see the grim 
vista of the swee=
ps, and the number of them was staggering. At the 
center of all this Cyclo=
nus floated a cold calm amidst the storm of 
sweeps that floated around him=
. 

To those who had been at the battle above Atlantis the sight brought 
a=
 darker reality: Although there were not as many sweep here as there 
were =
at Atlantis, with Cyclonus were several other minions: Darkfate 
and Nights=
trike as well as three others which were unknown - A 
warning that this bat=
tle may prove to be far more dangerous then the 
one before.

As Grimlock l=
anded and attacked his breath weapon attack proved to be 
effective, striki=
ng down several sweeps and singed several others as 
they maneuvered out of=
 his way. 

As Hydras approached from the rear his guns opening up on the r=
ear 
flank of the sweeps, they dispersed into the skies as several of them =

were brought down and many more came in to take their places. 

As the swe=
eps coiled around, absorbing the attacks from the would-be 
defenders, in u=
nison they began to open fire on Ark and Legacy as 
well as Grimlock and th=
e defending shuttle!

At same time minions were receiving orders from Scour=
ge who was 
himself floating into position and was more then ready to prove=
 
himself, "Tumult, Nightstrike and Darkfate You are with me! We go to 
des=
troy the ark, and TAKE the Matrix!"

The answer from Tumult was quick, "Yes=
 Sir!" as he powered up his 
engines and maneuvered himself into position n=
ear the top of the host.

Strangely the response for the approaching Decept=
icons and Predicons 
was a bit different - Although the Sweeps avoided comb=
at, no combat 
was initiated. Instead Hydras recieved a call: 

"Hydras" Cy=
clonus' calm voice crackled over the communication lines 
in an ancient Uni=
cronian code. "You were once Galvatron, I can feel 
his essence within you,=
 and I have felt it since you have approached. 
I have given you and yours =
a stay of execution because of that 
ancient connection between us. Approac=
h no farther and live, leave 
and you will be rewarded when our work here i=
s done."

Preston
(Da'minion)

Content-Type: text/html; charset=us-ascii

<table cellspacing='0' cellpadding='0' border='0' ><tr><td valign='top' style='font: inherit;'><P>::Grimlock::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Grimlock takes cover under one of the shuttles wings. He continues to fire off his flame breathe at any incoming Minion forces.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>::Lord Elder::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Elder opens the shuttle hatch and begins fireing off his blaster to add to the shuttles shots.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>::Lord Jhiaxus/Scorponok-Zarak::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Jhiaxus comes low to the ground and ejects Zarak.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Zarak lands in the Scorponok cockpit and activates the shell.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Scorponok launches two rockets, fires the fusion tail and the machine gun batteries at the Minions. The attack is coming from just outside the battle perimeter and from behind most of the Minions.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Jhiaxus heads streight into the masses and dogfights the Sweeps.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>::Dark Rodimus::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Rodimus pulls up to the peremter of the fight and watches. The battle is intense. Many will die. The fate of everything in their existence could be changed by the outcome. He was happy.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>With the sound of screeching tires Rodimus heads right into battle. He vehical form leaps into the air and transforms. He lands on one knee near the Maximal shuttle. Rodimus slowly raises to a standing position.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>He looks up at Cyclonus and releases an all out assualt. Over shouler rockets, his rapid fire wrist mounts, optic lasers and his duel weld machine pistols.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>::Kup::</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Very far from the battle Kup was with Elita at the Watcher base. He watched the readout screen in horror. In the last hour he had watched all the forces of each battle converge at one point: the Ark! This was the big push and they had to push back. He knew what must be done.</P>
<P> </P>
<P>Kup: Elita, you must do me a favor. Without protest I need you to stay here with the staff. I have to go to that battle. I cannot sit out on a situation this serious any longer. Please understand.<BR><BR>--- On <B>Wed, 7/9/08, supercyclonus <I><supercyclonus@...></I></B> wrote:<BR></P>

<DIV id=yiv139782512>
<DIV id=ygrp-text>

Firepower <BR>ripped into the invaders as first the shuttle's batteries and then <BR>the Ark violently pulled sweeps from the skies! <BR><BR>However much like the last battle the sweeps dispersed, making them <BR>much harder to hit. Using their agility and speed they turned in the <BR>air, spinning as the weapons continued to pepper the skies with <BR>bullets and energy!<BR><BR>Legacy for his part pulled back, using the Ark as an additional <BR>defence as he laid into the oncoming sweeps.  his guns opening up on the rear <BR>flank of the sweeps, they dispersed into the skies as several of them <BR>were brought down and many more came in to take their places. <BR><BR>As the sweeps coiled around, absorbing the attacks from the would-be <BR>defenders, in unison they began to open fire on Ark and Legacy as <BR>well as Grimlock and the defending shuttle!<BR><BR>At same time minions were receiving orders from Scourge who was <BR>himself floating into position and was more then ready to prove <BR>himself, "Tumult, Nightstrike and Darkfate You are with me! We go to <BR>destroy the ark, and TAKE the Matrix!"<BR><BR>The answer from Tumult was quick, "Yes Sir!" as he powered up his <BR>engines and maneuvered himself into position near the top of the host.<BR><BR>Strangely the response for the approaching Decepticons and Predicons <BR>was a bit different - Although the Sweeps avoided combat, no combat <BR>was initiated. "You were once Galvatron, I can feel <BR>his essence within you, and I have felt it since you have approached. <BR>I have given you and yours a stay of execution because of that <BR>ancient connection between us. Approach no farther and live, leave <BR>and you will be rewarded when our work here is done."<BR><BR>Preston<BR>(Da'minion)<BR><BR></P></DIV></DIV></BLOCKQUOTE></td></tr></table><br>
